titles.title: Stop the Biden Caravan Now Act
To secure the southern border of the United States against illegal border crossings, and for other purposes.
Stop the Biden Caravan Now Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Border Security, Facilitation, and Operations.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Stop the Biden Caravan Now Act
This bill requires the Department of Homeland Security to transfer all equipment and personnel used to provide additional security in the District of Columbia since January 12, 2021, to the southern U.S. border.
